attributes.action: Charles Beavis, Edwina Beavis, Andrew Wright, Jenny Wright, Pauline Smith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the government to make it compulsory and pay for every household in the UK  to install carbon monoxide dt#etectors. People are being killed by this silent killer quiet regularly at this present time, another death today. How many more are there to be before something  is done??

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
